original_text:
When a farmer plows for planting, does he plow continually?
    Does he keep on breaking up and working the soil?
korean_text: 파종하려고 가는 자가 어찌 쉬지 않고 갈기만 하겠느냐 자기 땅을 개간하며 고르게만 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: When a farmer plows for planting
sentences.korean_translation: 농부가 심기 위해 밭을 갈 때

sentences.original_text: Does he keep on breaking up
